With the Apple model- which works extremely well, as I know as a former Apple board member- you have to use their development tools, their platform, their software, their hardware, Eric Schmidt said at a conference this fall. "If you submit an application, they have to approve it. You have to use their monetization and their distribution. That would not be open.
